song.title: Resurrecting
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .F Am G
[1] . F Am G The head that once was crowned with thorns . F C Is crowned with glory now . F Am G The Savior knelt to wash our feet . F C Now at His feet we bow
[2] . F Am G The One who wore our sin and shame . F C Now robed in majesty . F Am G The radiance of perfect love . F C Now shines for all to see
[C] . F C G Your name, Your name is victory . F C G All praise will rise to Christ our King
[B] .F C G Am F By Your Spirit I will rise from the ashes of defeat . C G Am F The resurrected King is resurrecting me || . C G Am F In Your name I come alive to declare Your victory . C G Am F The resurrected King is resurrecting me ---
[3] . F Am G The fear that held us now gives way . F C To Him who is our peace . F Am G His final breath upon the cross . F C Is now alive in me
[4] . F Am G The tomb where Life itself was laid . F C Was borrowed for three days || . F Am G His body there would not remain . F C Our God has robbed the grave . F C Our God has robbed the grave
